summary: The Foreign Robocall Elimination Act directs the FCC to establish a taskforce on unlawful robocalls. This taskforce will include representatives from various federal agencies and the private sector. The taskforce will study the problem of foreign-originated robocalls, analyze financial losses, explore technical solutions, recommend ways to combat these calls, and submit a report to Congress with its findings and recommendations within a year of being established. The act also clarifies funding usage and sets a termination date for the taskforce.
